_meta.source: Researched from Hawaii tourism, Pearl Harbor NPS, and cruise guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Pearl Harbor, downtown Honolulu, Waikiki, and Diamond Head

transit_routes.name: Bus to Pearl Harbor
transit_routes.note: TheBus Route 42 or 20. Taxi/Uber also available ($40-50). Ship excursions most convenient.

transit_routes.name: Bus to Waikiki
transit_routes.note: Multiple bus routes serve Waikiki from Aloha Tower area. Easy public transit.

featured_experiences.name: Pearl Harbor
featured_experiences.note: Free USS Arizona tickets required (reserve at recreation.gov). Full complex worth the time. Emotional experience.

featured_experiences.name: Diamond Head Hike
featured_experiences.note: Reservations required. Moderate 1.6-mile hike. Best early morning. Bring water!

featured_experiences.name: Waikiki Beach Day
featured_experiences.note: Iconic Hawaiian experience. Easy bus from port. Can combine with Diamond Head.
